replies.body: Where did you get this one?

This looks familiar, but can't put my finger on it

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EPi5TbI2,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-04-05T04:39:25.295+0000)
>
> This looks familiar, but can't put my finger on it
> http://i.imgur.com/OB02vvw.png[/img]

Umaru? that the name of the anime this is based

I was thinking more Umaru-chan, but that's obscure even for Laughing Fish.


...and then I find this looking for an image to show you:


https://38.media.tumblr.com/57a8c0efbd65599aa26fd6e87cb14d8b/tumblr_nr6ndeEpus1u21ng6o1_540.gif
Why is Riven the only one in a straight jacket?
I think those are bandage wraps.
Then where are her arms?
In her hair.  Hard to see, I know.
You sure that isn't a part?

It's right next to the hair strip.  It's pink, like her skin.  

Wait, are you color blind?
No. but that little strip of pink doesn't look like an arm too me.
It's chibi, they don't look like actually bodies in the first place.

Except you can clearly identify the arms on everyone but Jax and RIven just by movement. ;p

Regardless. This is going nowhere and honestly serves no value.
As do a lot of topics.
i love this show
And... saved.

My thoughts when I play with a Lulu on my team are mainly "stop saying weird shit, Lulu c:"
